result.arabic_text: وَإِذۡ قُلۡنَا لِلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ ٱسۡجُدُواْ لِأٓدَمَ فَسَجَدُوٓاْ إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ قَالَ ءَأَسۡجُدُ لِمَنۡ خَلَقۡتَ طِينٗا
result.translation: Ntumwa y’Imana! Ibuka kandi n’igihe Twebwe Allah, Twabwiriza abamalayika hamwe na “Ibilisi[359]” Duti: “Nimwubamire Adamu mumuhe icubahiro kimukwiye”, abamalayika baraheza baragamburuka barubama kiretse Ibilisi yakomoka mu Majini, yaciye avuga ku bwishime n’akantu ati: “Vyoshoboka gute ko nubamira ikiremwa Waremye mw’ivu!”.
result.footnotes: [359] Ibilisi, ni izina ry’ikiremwa ca mbere mu Majini, ni na co cahavuye kiba inkomoko y’amajini. Mu Majini rero harimwo abemeramana hakabamwo n’abagarariji (amashetani).
